name: Slingbacks
description: Slingbacks with pointed toes and comma heels. Narrow foot strap and an elasticized ankle strap. Jersey lining. Heel height 3 1/2 in.

name: Platform Sandals
description: Platform sandals with round toes and covered block heels. Narrow foot straps and an adjustable ankle strap with metal buckle. Front platform height approx. 1 1/2 in. Heel height 3 3/4 in.

name: Heeled Platform Sandals
description: Sandals with open toes, wide foot straps and covered block heels. Front platform height approx. 1 1/2 in. Heel height 3 3/4 in.

description: Sandals with open toes, wide foot straps and covered block heels. Front platform height approx. 1 1/2 in. Heel height 3 3/4 in.
